title: Asia Warehousing Show 2020
description: Asia Warehousing Show (AWS) and co-located shows Material Handling Equipment (MHE) Asia Expo, Supply Chain Asia Zone and Robotics & Automation for Warehouse & Logistics Asia Zone is scheduled to take place in BITEC, Bangkok, Thailand. AWS is an International B2B exhibition and meeting place for Intra-logistics Industry professionals from diverse Industries to witness, learn and procure the latest innovations, equipment and technologies available in warehousing, material handling, storage, AIDC, robotics and automation, supply chain, transport & logistics.
ticket: ไม่มีค่าเข้าชม
